# Description

# Individual function explanation

## generate_dna(length)

The first function called generate_dna() is used for creating a random DNA sequence that contains four nucleotides: "A", "T", "C", "G". Inside the function a wanted length of the sequence is entered and DNA is generated randomly into a single string.
